description:
SUMMER VENGEANCE MATCH UP: QUARTER FINALS!
ARIEL X
The Assassin
HT: 5'3
WT: 115lbs
Season record (5-0)
Lifetime record (12-2)
Ranked 4th
HOLLIE STEVENS
The Amazon
HT: 5'7
WT: 150lbs
Season record (1-2)
Lifetime record (5-7)
Ranked 10th
Welcome to the 2009 Championship tournament. The top 16 wrestlers of the season face off in a single elimination tournament. Check out the Summer Vengeance Bracket here.
Now the competition steps up. We are in the Quarterfinal matches, the top 8 square off to see who is the elite, the best US has to offer.
Ariel X went undefeated this season with a perfect 5-0 record. This will be her toughest match this year. Ariel is giving up 4 inches and 35lbs. Can she over come the huge size difference and move forward to the Semifinals?
Hollie Stevens is back after taking off last season due to an injury. She quickly reasserted herself as a top ten wrestler. She is big, strong and knows how to use her weight.
title: SUMMER VENGEANCE TOURNAMENT MATCH UP!
